official_title: To amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to limit the quantity of milk protein products that may be imported into the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to limit annual imports of milk protein products to 50 percent of the average annual amount imported during the period 1985 through 1987. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to establish a preferential import licensing system for such products based on the availability of domestic substitutes.

titles.title: To amend the Agricultural Act of 1949 to limit the quantity of milk protein products that may be imported into the United States.
